channel.title: How to make a quest?
channel.description: Im wondering how can i make a quest. i need to know all the elements and how to start it by talking to a npc, saying yes then he says come back when you prepared for the "ultimate challenge". u come back when ur prepared then he teleports you. you kill the monster, bring back is head then trade it for a reward. Please and Thank You

item.title: How to make a quest?
item.dc:creator: @statsflamescape statsflamescape
item.description:
@statsflamescape wrote:

i already have the items, npc’s blah blah blah but i need to set up the story line as in talking to him and he asks for help…

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a quest?
item.dc:creator: @Wildy_kingz Wildy kingz
item.description:
@Wildy_kingz wrote:

well to start off your going to need to design the head of the monster (the same way you make custom items) i would suggest using the dwarf head as a base and the rest other people will help with

Read full topic
